Jibble is an API Key based integration and does not require the setup of an app. ​ Required Credentials of a Linked Account To successfully connect with the Jibble integration, a Linked Account or an end-user will need to provide the following to connect: API Key ID API Key Secret To understand how a Linked Account can get the above mentioned credentials, refer below. ​ Getting Credentials of Jibble To acquire the required credentials and connect a Linked Account, please follow the steps mentioned below: Log in to your Jibble account . Click on Organization under Settings in the side menu and click on API Credentials tab. Click on Create New Secret button, enter the Name and click on Save . Copy the API Key ID and API Key Secret displayed. Copy the API Key Secret as it will not be shown again. ​ Actions and triggers In Cobalt, you can create orchestrations of your use-cases using Jibble actions and triggers. Following are the set of Jibble actions and triggers supported by Cobalt. Actions Triggers Clients List Clients - List clients in Jibble. Members List Members - List members in Jibble. Create Member - Create member in Jibble. Update Member - Update member in Jibble. Delete Member - Delete a member in Jibble. Time Offs List Time Offs - List time off overview in Jibble. Create Time Off Request - Create a time off interval in Jibble. Update Time Off Request - Update a time off interval in Jibble. Others HTTP Request - Make HTTP API calls to any Jibble documented REST APIs.
